G

Game - Class in logic
This class is responsible for the game loop.
Game() - Constructor for class logic.Game
Creates a Game set to the first level.
Game(int, GuardPersonality) - Constructor for class logic.Game
Creates a Game set to the first level.
Game(char[][], boolean, boolean, boolean) - Constructor for class logic.Game
Creates a Game set to the first and only level.
GameStartSet - Class in logic
This class is a class that serves a variable controller for the new game to be created.
GameStartSet(int, int) - Constructor for class logic.GameStartSet
Creates a GameStartSet with specified width and height, being a user created level.
GameStartSet(int, GuardPersonality) - Constructor for class logic.GameStartSet
Creates a GameStartSet with specified ogresCount and guardPersonality, that is not a created level.
